titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 75th anniversary of the Warsaw Uprising.
A resolution recognizing the 75th anniversary of the Warsaw Uprising.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch without amendment and with an amended preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 339.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status
War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 75th anniversary of the Warsaw Uprising and commends the bravery and patriotism of those who fought as part of the Polish Home Army against German Nazi occupation.
